featured.text: So, no matter how busy you are, try to 40 for exercise every day, like a 15-minute walk with your dog.
He saw no reason why this could not be adapted for use on the busy London intersections.
Despite his busy schedule, the President ______ the school’s graduation ceremony with his presence and a heartwarming speech. (A) praised (B) graced (C) addressed (D) credited 10.
He returned the tickets, enclosing a note, which said, “I shall be busy that evening.

other.text: Because Mr. Chang has been busy these days, it's whether he will come to the party.
He was busy on the first night of the show.

definition.zh_def: 忙碌的，指有很多事情要做或沒有空閒時間的狀態。
definition.en_def: Engaged in activity; having a lot to do.
definition.example: She is too busy to meet for lunch this week.
